column5: I took this photo this morning at work. They says its going to fall all day... And I was supposed to pickup my new boat tonight. lol  Might be a cold walleye opener in the North     ...didn't realize Randy had already made a post...
20 Minutes away and it's the same thing Luc....  They're calling for a nice weekend for opener.  La Tempete des Corneilles.   Randy
yup, we are just putting up the Christmas decorations now and getting the snow tires on
Didn't we do the exact same thing this time last year.

In the few years i have been here the weather pattern seems to be a nice week or two in march/april and the the weather turns to crap until about july. love the bay..o and last year the weather was bad until august, i had most of july off and it rained all but 3 days.
bingo. i think last summer the best weather we had was in April and then the last few weeks in August. here's hoping we don't have a repeat of that.
